quote: An ear for music is very different from a taste for music. I have no ear whatever  I could not sing an air to save my life  but I have the intensest delight in music  and can detect good from bad.
quote_letters: AN EAR FOR MUSIC IS VERY DIFFERENT FROM A TASTE FOR MUSIC I HAVE NO EAR WHATEVER  I COULD NOT SING AN AIR TO SAVE MY LIFE  BUT I HAVE THE INTENSEST DELIGHT IN MUSIC  AND CAN DETECT GOOD FROM BAD
